price: E de Allah é o que há nos céus e o que há na terra. E Allah está sempre abarcando todas as cousas.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّحِيطٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wakāna al-lahu bikulli shayin muḥīṭan
